00026 // lbann_learning_rate .hpp .cpp - Callback hooks for learning rate schedules
00028 
00029 #ifndef LBANN_CALLBACKS_LEARNING_RATE_HPP_INCLUDED
00030 #define LBANN_CALLBACKS_LEARNING_RATE_HPP_INCLUDED
00031 
00032 #include <unordered_set>
00033 #include <unordered_map>
00034 #include "lbann/callbacks/lbann_callback.hpp"
00035 
00036 namespace lbann {
00037 
00038 // Different schedules should inherit from lbann_callback_learning_rate.
00039 
00044 class lbann_callback_learning_rate : public lbann_callback {
00045 public:
00046   lbann_callback_learning_rate();
00048   lbann_callback_learning_rate(std::unordered_set<uint> _layers);
00050   void setup(model* m);
00052   void on_epoch_begin(model* m);
00053 protected:
00060   virtual float schedule(model* m, Layer* l) = 0;
00062   bool is_last_layer(const Layer* l) const {
00063     return l->get_index() == last_idx;
00064   }
00065 private:
00067   std::unordered_set<uint> layer_indices;
00069   std::unordered_map<uint, float> old_lrs;
00071   uint last_idx;
00072 };
00073 
00077 class lbann_callback_step_learning_rate : public lbann_callback_learning_rate {
00078 public:
00080   lbann_callback_step_learning_rate(int step, float amt);
00081   lbann_callback_step_learning_rate(int step, float amt,
00082                                     std::unordered_set<uint> _layers);
00083 protected:
00084   float schedule(model* m, Layer* l);
00085 private:
00087   int step;
00089   float amt;
00090 };
00091 
00096 class lbann_callback_acc_learning_rate : public lbann_callback_learning_rate {
00097 public:
00102   lbann_callback_acc_learning_rate(int64_t patience, float amt);
00103   lbann_callback_acc_learning_rate(int64_t patience, float amt,
00104                                    std::unordered_set<uint> _layers);
00105 protected:
00106   float schedule(model* m, Layer* l);
00107 private:
00109   int64_t patience;
00111   float amt;
00113   DataType last_acc;
00115   int64_t wait;
00116 };
00117 
00121 class lbann_callback_custom_learning_rate : public lbann_callback_learning_rate {
00122 public:
00124   lbann_callback_custom_learning_rate(
00125     std::function<float(model*, Layer*)> custom_schedule);
00126   lbann_callback_custom_learning_rate(
00127     std::function<float(model*, Layer*)> custom_schedule,
00128     std::unordered_set<uint> _layers);
00129 protected:
00130   float schedule(model* m, Layer* l);
00131 private:
00133   std::function<float(model*, Layer*)> custom_schedule;
00134 };

00136 }  // namespace lbann
